title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Competencies: IoT-Based Educational System Transformation and Systems Thinking Application

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain ≥3 impacts of IoT technology on the physical/administrative design of educational systems
Learners will apply systems thinking frameworks to analyze interaction elements in IoT-based educational scenarios
Learners will present case-based examples of how IoT technology contributes to educational logistics (attendance management, learning space optimization, etc.)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
